alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 3:17PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Locally heavy rain, accumulating hail and wind gusts around 40 mph will impact portions of southwestern Fremont, northern Jefferson and central Clark Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 314 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms from near Idmon to Dubois to 13 miles west of Dubois, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph, accumulating half inch hail, and locally heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dubois, Parker, Chester, St Anthony, Saint Anthony Sand Dunes, Edie School and Small. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Upper Snake River Plain
